data.actual_result: -If the hover text includes a space:
data.expected_result: -The hyperlink text is displayed, the hyperlink hover text is not displayed, regardless of whether the hover text includes a space. This is what it was like before the recent update to embeds.
data.short_description: Hyperlinks without URLs are broken (nothing gets displayed at all / what needs to be displayed doesn't get displayed, what needs to be invisible gets displayed)
data.steps_to_repro: - View an embed with a hyperlink that has hover text and no URLOR:- View an embed with a hyperlink that has hover text, no URL and no space (e.g. `abc` vs `a bc`) in the hover text *Side note: if you don't have access to a bot to build embeds, shoot me a DM*
